item.title: Clanware Panels
item.description: Clanware has a number of panels that are responsible for various aspects of the organization and the community. These panels are made up of volunteers from the Clanware community who are dedicated to improving and safeguarding the genre of Roblox clanning.

item.title: The Clanware Community
item.description: The Clanware Community refers to the primary server of the Clanware member-base. This page may be useful to you if new to Clanware.

item.title: War-Clan Walkthrough
item.description: This section will explain the technicalities regarding “War Clans”, going into depth on what they are, and how to get involved.
